  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bug_407_ac.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bug_407_ac.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_407_SON/bug_407_ac.cir.prn )

endif()
